nodes.text: Bilzen was a planet in the galaxy that housed a number of frozen caverns containing giant icicles. Kanan Jarrus once traveled there with his apprentice Ezra Bridger for training. However, their session was interrupted when the Seventh Sister and the Fifth Brother, two Jedi hunters serving in the Galactic Empire's Inquisitorius, arrived on Bilzen.

Bilzen first appeared in "Ice Breaking", a short Canon comic, written by Martin Fisher and illustrated by Bob Molesworth, that appeared in Star Wars Rebels Magazine 16, which was published on March 23, 2016.
